actions.text: Amendment SA 2153 under the order of 5/23/12, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 62. Record Vote Number: 112.
Amendment SA 2153 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Alexander. (consideration: CR S3609-3611; text: CR S3609) In the nature of a substitute.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2153 under the order of 5/23/12, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 62. Record Vote Number: 112.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2153 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Alexander.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2153 under the order of 5/23/12, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 62. Record Vote Number: 112.

purpose: In the nature of a substitute.
